name: Frog Shelter
description:
Terry the Frog has fallen from his house high atop the Amazon Rain forest and it's up to you to help him hop back up to the top. 

Make sure to seek shelter, as hungry birds will be on the lookout for your tasty frog!

The higher you go the more spread out available shelter will become.

Reach Terry's house to Win!

Use A and D to Aim Terry left or right

Hold-down the space bar to determine how far he hops, not pressing A or D will cause Terry to hop straight up

Music By James Evans
